text: Alexis Arias Tuesta (born 13 December 1995) is a Peruvian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Melgar and the Peru . ==International career== Arias represented the Peru U23s at the 2015 Pan Am Games. He made his debut for the senior Peru national team in a friendly 2–0 loss to El Salvador on 27 March 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * AS Profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Callao Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peru international footballers Category:Peru youth international footballers Category:FBC Melgar footballers Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alexis Arias (footballer)
